message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its price.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $15,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that the product is valuable, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
